text: Inene iNkosi yenu nguAllâh, Owadala amazulu nomhlaba ngeentsuku ezintandathu, Waza Waphakamela ngentla kweTrone. Uvelisa ubusuku bube sisigqubuthelo semini engxamayo ukubulandela, kanti (Yena Wadala) ilanga, inyanga neenkwenkwezi ziphantsi komyalelo waKhe. Inene, Yena yeyaKhe indalo nomthetho. Usikelelekile uAllâh, iNkosi yamaphakade
